com.craftar

Class CraftARFullScreenVideoActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.craftar.CraftARFullScreenVideoActivity

  • public class CraftARFullScreenVideoActivity
extends Activity
    Sample Activity showing a video in fullScreen. You can call the method toogleFullScreen from a CraftARContentVideo, and this activity will start playing that video. Note that to use this, you need to declare this activity in your AndroidManifest as com.craftar.CraftARFullScreenVideoActivity
